profile:
Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is an established company with a proven track record. We specialize in comfort solutions and also respond quickly to no heating calls, no cooling calls, leaking water heaters, and we service and install furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters, thermostats, indoor air quality products resolving indoor air quality issues or problems with mould, ventilation and other indoor air common problems. We have 17 years of experience in this industry and deliver the best quality workmanship. Any HVAC Issues big or small Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is the company to call. We also have a Master Electrician and a Certified Plumber on staff as well to help you with any issues you have with your electrical or plumbing needs at home from replacing electrical panels, safety inspections, replacing toilets, sinks, fixing leaks or installing hot water tanks to boiler systems.

   “ All electrical work is subcontracted to ECRA/ESA Licensed Electrical Contractors. "

profile:
Thanks for visiting us at HomeStars. At Premiere Custom Millwork & Fireplaces Ltd, our philosophy is simple; to be the best we can be in servicing your needs. We believe that our customers come first; it is not just a cliché but a commitment we make to all our past and future customers. 

To be successful in business, it takes a winning combination of services, competitive pricing and dedication by all employees to excel at customer service excellence. Our continued growth is testament to our pledge to provide you with products of the highest quality and unmatched customer service; we have built our reputation on this belief. 

We encourage you to look around our site and see what we have to offer. If you don’t see what you are looking for, call us at 905-671-3473 and we will be happy to discuss your needs.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
For over 15 years, Direct Air Heating and Cooling LTD has provided Toronto with unsurpassed professionalism and personal courtesy on every call no matter the size or scope of the project.

We install top quality equipment by manufacturers such as Amana, Coleman, Trane, Mitsubishi and Fujitsu. Quality, integrity and reliability at the right price since 1995.
We want you to know that when you invite one of our Specialists into your home, we honor the trust you are placing in our expertise, the top quality products and equipment we use, and our reputation for integrity.

Our mission is to provide home comfort solutions that meet or exceed our customer’s expectations through professional design, installation, service and use of environmentally friendly, energy efficient products.

profile:
COVID 19 Update: We are OPEN for Business during this time and will take all the necessary health and safety percautions for our staff and for any homeowner that wants to schedule a job with us. We're also available for calls, emails, and virtual meetings. We're here for you. 

****  

Family owned & operated. 30+ years of experience with jobs from chimney rebuilds to old home restorations. We service Toronto & the GTA.
Not only do we pride ourselves on customer service and giving the customer what they want, but we specialize in hard-to-reach chimneys, difficult scaffolding set-ups, and fireplaces.

We are a fully-insured company with our staff fully trained in Working from Heights and WHMIS as minimum requirements. Additionally, we employ a WSIB-certififed Health and Safety Representative that ensures that all safety requirements are in for not only our staff but you as well.

We are a member of CSAO Toronto and a handful of community employment programs (such as Springboard), which allows youth to not only apprentice within Bowman Masonry but have an equal opportunity in the job market.

I sincerely thank you for considering Bowman Masonry Restoration LTD., and I look forward to hearing from you,

Guy Bowman
Owner

profile:
Dear  Customers, Dear Friends
 
Thank you very much for your support, warm feedbacks and all references that we are getting from you. 
We are here to serve you and will gladly accept the opportunity to exceed your expectations. We are so passionate about the quality of our work and the treatment of our customers, we want you to know just what you can expect when you buy your marble or granite counter tops from Marble Treasure.
 
    The reason we are in business is to serve you.
    Your concerns, needs and desires are our top priority.
    You are not dependent on us; we are dependent on you.
    Your inquiries are not an interruption of our work; they are the reason for it.
    You do us a favor when you call and we feel privileged to serve you.
    You represent an integral part of our business; just like our staff.
    You tell us what you want and we will strive to fulfill that want.
    You are the client. It is not our place to argue with you but to see that you are satisfied.
    You are deserving of the most courteous and attentive treatment we can provide.
    You are our lifeblood. We exist to exceed your expectations.
 
Sincerely,
 
Marble Treasure Inc Team
 
 
Showroom hours:
 
Monday –Thursday 10am-7pm
Friday from 10am-6pm and Sat from 10am-4pm
Sunday closed
